en.Title: ✨Easy-to-use LLM Training Data Generation Framework✨
en.Intro:
is a framework for synthetic data generation guided by knowledge graphs, designed to tackle challenges for knowledge-intensive QA generation. 

By uploading your text chunks (such as knowledge in agriculture, healthcare, or marine science) and filling in the LLM API key, you can generate the training data required by **[LLaMA-Factory](https://github.com/hiyouga/LLaMA-Factory)** and **[xtuner](https://github.com/InternLM/xtuner)** online. We will automatically delete user information after completion.
en.Use Trainee Model: Use Trainee Model to identify knowledge blind spots, please keep disable for SiliconCloud
en.Synthesizer URL Info: Base URL for the Synthesizer Model API, use SiliconFlow as default
en.Synthesizer Model Info: Model for constructing KGs and generating QAs
en.Trainee URL Info: Base URL for the Trainee Model API, use SiliconFlow as default
en.SiliconFlow Token for Trainee Model: SiliconFlow API Key for Trainee Model

zh.Title: 基于知识图谱的数据合成预研
zh.Intro:
基于知识图谱的数据合成，旨在知识密集型任务中生成问答。

 上传你的文本块（txt），填写 LLM api key，即可在线生成所需训练数据。
 或者在后台执行命令: 
python -m graphgen.generate --config_file graphgen/configs/cot_config.yaml --output_dir cache/
zh.Use Trainee Model: 使用ECE识别学生模型的知识盲区(勾选该选项则须配置学生模型相关信息)
